dmca.title: Penn State Demands "Obedience to Authority" (Film Link Removal)
dmca.body:
To Digg:

 Please remove Original Stanley Milgram Experiment Film- Obedience to Authority from the www.digg.com  website. Penn State University has exclusive rights to distribute this material.    

 The copyrighted work at issue is the video that appears on:


http://digg.com/educational/Original_Stanley_Milgram_Experiment_Film_Obedience_to_Authority


 This is taken from a video distributed by Penn State University on behalf of the Milgram Estate.

 I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  I swear under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 Sincerely,

 ( please see attached signature)
[private]

Director Penn State Media Sales
The Pennsylvania State University
[private]
University Park, PA 16802 
[private]
[private]
